numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that younger groups are optimistic about different generations.
2. Various countries participated in this survey.
3. These countries do not have a similar political agenda.
4. These countries do not have a similar economic agenda.
5. I wonder why older generations do not think that the world is getting better.
6. I wonder what causes older generations to believe that the world is not getting better.
7. I wonder what causes younger generations to have views of a better future.
8. I wonder whether older generations and younger generations will ever see eye to eye.
9. This relates to me and my community.
10. Some adults in my community think that the younger generation is disruptive.
11. Some adults in my community think that the younger generation is uneducated.
12. Some adults in my community think that the younger generation is ignorant.
13. Many younger people in my community think that they are making a big difference.
14. Many younger people in my community know how to speak up.
15. Many younger people in my community attend protests.
16. Many younger people in my community allow themselves to be heard.
17. The title could be "Same Age Once ; Difference in Views".
